entity.name: item
entity.query: SELECT id, shop_id, name, remark, price, last_time FROM item WHERE is_deleted=0
entity.deltaQuery: SELECT id FROM item WHERE is_deleted=0 AND last_time > '${dataimporter.item.last_index_time}'
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT id, shop_id, name, remark, price, last_time FROM item WHERE id='${dataimporter.delta.id}'
entity.deletedPkQuery: SELECT id FROM item WHERE last_time > '${dataimporter.item.last_index_time}' AND is_deleted=1
